place.name: ABERLADY
place.gazetteerText: Aberlady, par. and vil., in co. and 5¼ miles NW. of Haddington, on bay of same name -- par., 4319 ac., pop. 1000; vil., pop. 441; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
